items.title: Littler demolishes Humphries to win World Grand Prix
items.summary: World champion Luke Littler clinically defeats world number one Luke Humphries 6-1 to win his first World Grand Prix title.

items.title: Ghana seal place at 2026 World Cup - who else has qualified?
items.summary: BBC Sport's Ask Me Anything team looks at who has qualified for next year's Fifa World Cup.

items.title: UK Rapper Giggs Takes Center Stage as NFL Spices Up International Games With HalftimeÂ Shows
items.summary: Giggs has done collaborations with artists including Drake, 21 Savage and Ed Sheeran.
items.body: The NFL has been spicing up its international games with halftime performers, a bit like mini-Super Bowls. British rapper Giggs performed Sunday (Oct. 12) at halftime of the game between the New York Jets and Denver Broncos at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. The Broncos won 13-11. â€œItâ€™s a huge moment to be a part of the London Games,â€ Giggs said. â€œIâ€™ve been on a journey with my music, and to get to share that with my city and the NFL fans is something Iâ€™m really proud of.â€ The south London nativeâ€™s 2007 single â€œTalkinâ€™ da Hardestâ€ remains a popular anthem among his fans. Cleveland Browns players unfamiliar with the song  liked what they heard  when it was played last week. Giggs has done collaborations with artists including Drake, 21 Savage, Ed Sheeran and Dave. Last week, British singer Raye performed a halftime show at Tottenham with a nearly seven-minute set that included her hit â€œWhere is My Husband!â€ The Minnesota Vikings beat Cleveland 21-17 in the game. British singer-songwriter Myles Smith was chosen to headline the halftime show at the first-ever regular-season NFL game in Ireland. At Croke Park, the Pittsburgh Steelers beat the Vikings 24-21 two weeks ago. Last monâ€¦

items.title: How can Scotland qualify for 2026 World Cup?
items.summary: Scotland will finish either first or second in their World Cup qualification group. But how do they reach the finals?

items.title: 'Australia break new ground to leave Healy one mountain to climb'
items.summary: Alyssa Healy's sublime century in Australia's record chase against India leaves the wicketkeeper one box left to tick - a Women's World Cup title as captain.

items.title: Pickford set for new Everton deal - Monday's gossip
items.summary: Everton set to sign goalkeeper Jordan Pickford to a new long-term contract, Barcelona not planning to extend Robert Lewandowski contract, Newcastle United could allow William Osula leave, plus more.

items.title: 'Wildest I've seen him in 72 games' - Clarke angered by Scotland on historic night
items.summary: Scotland head coach Steve Clarke says his side's performance against Belarus was a "head scratcher" despite winning 2-1.

items.title: 'Wildest I've seen him in 72 games' - Clarke angered by Scotland on historic night
items.summary: Scotland head coach Steve Clarke says his side's performance against Belarus was a "head scratcher" despite winning 2-1.

items.title: How grit and goals define new Man City approach
items.summary: With his team scoring late yet again to beat Liverpool in the Women's Super League on Sunday, is there evidence that Andree Jeglertz is creating something special at Manchester City?

items.title: Chappell Roan Secures Her Greatness at Final L.A. â€˜Damselsâ€™ Show: 5 BestÂ Moments
items.summary: The star proved she's one of her generation's most compelling performers at the concluding show of her limited U.S. pop-up tour.
items.body: Chappell Roan concluded the six-show U.S. leg of her Visions of Damsels & Other Dangerous Things tour in Pasadena, Calif., on Saturday night (Oct. 11) with a transcendent set that helped cement her status as one of the greatest performers of her generation. Drawing a star-studded crowd that included SZA , Pedro Pascal, Sarah Paulson, Kesha and Tove Lo , Roan â€” dressed in a sparkly green two-piece bikini paired with matching Wonder Woman-esque forearm cuffs and knee-high boots â€” plowed through a set that included the majority of songs from her star-making debut album, The Rise and Fall of a Midwest Princess , along with standalone smashes â€œGood Luck, Babe!â€ and â€œThe Subwayâ€ and a fierce cover of Heartâ€™s â€œBarracuda.â€ Related Chappell Roan Thanks Fans for ‘Sticking With Me’ Through ‘Really Hard’ Year at Triumphant NYC Homecoming Show Prior to Roanâ€™s emergence on stage, fans were treated to a festival-like atmosphere at the Rose Bowl-adjacent Brookside Park, made up into what might best be described as â€œChappellchella.â€ In addition to a plethora of food booths and merch stations, attendees were spoiled for choice in terms of Instagram-worthy photo oppsâ€¦

items.title: Clarke 'really, really disappointed' by Scotland despite win
items.summary: Scotland head coach Steve Clarke is pleased with victory but unhappy with his side's performance in their World Cup qualification win over Belarus.

items.title: Nagelsmann did not mean 'any disrespect' to NI
items.summary: Germany manager Julian Nagelsmann says Northern Ireland have a "special way" of playing and he did not mean any offence with his comments after his side's 3-1 win in Cologne last month.

items.title: Healy helps record chase as Australia beat India
items.summary: Annabel Sutherland's five-wicket haul and Alyssa Healy's 142 run knock help Australia secure the highest ever successful run chase in a women's One Day International, as they beat India by three wickets with six balls to spare in the ICC Women's Cricket World Cup.

items.title: Manchester City come from behind to beat Liverpool
items.summary: Iman Beney and Aoba Fujino score for Manchester City in their 2-1 win at Liverpool.

items.title: â€˜Good Morning Americaâ€™ Teases â€˜Hugeâ€™ Taylor Swift â€˜The Life of a Showgirlâ€™Â Announcement
items.summary: The pop superstarâ€™s 12th album is already shattering multiple sales records.
items.body: Good Morning America is teasing a big reveal involving Taylor Swift . On Sunday (Oct. 12), the ABC morning show shared a â€œhuge new exclusive announcementâ€ on social media, hinting at news tied to the 35-year-old pop superstarâ€™s 12th studio album, The Life of a Showgirl . Related Taylor Swift’s ‘The Life of a Showgirl’ Breaks Modern-Era Single-Week U.S. Album Sales Record Taylor Swift Reveals Whether She Plans to Tour for ‘Life of a Showgirl’: ‘I Would Want to Do It Really Well Again’ How Do We Grade the Rollout for Taylor Swift’s ‘The Life of a Showgirl’ at This New Commercial Peak? “TOMORROW: Weâ€™re keep it ğŸ’¯ with an exclusive Taylor Swift announcement! Tune in ONLY on GMA!” the show wrote on Instagram . The post includes a clip from Swiftâ€™s â€œThe Fate of Opheliaâ€ video, accompanied by a voiceover that says, â€œSheâ€™s at it again. Taylor Swift shattering records with the biggest album debut in history with over four million units. And now tomorrow morning, GMA has a huge new exclusive announcement on Taylor. So whatâ€™s next for her? Find out on Good Morning America .” It was unclear at press tâ€¦

items.title: 'Unbelievable strike' - Walsh wins it for Chelsea against Spurs
items.summary: Keira Walsh's "unbelievable strike" breaks the deadlock in the second half for Chelsea against Tottenham.

items.title: Smith inspires Harlequins to victory over Saracens
items.summary: England fly-half Marcus Smith marks his Prem return with 15 of Harlequins' 20 points in a narrow victory over local rivals Saracens.

items.title: Chappell Roan Told to â€˜Get a Gripâ€™ by Homeland Security Over â€˜Fâ€”k ICEâ€™ Remark at Rose BowlÂ Show
items.summary: The pop star took the stage at Brookside at the Rose Bowl in L.A. on Oct. 10â€“11.
items.body: Chappell Roan is facing criticism from the U.S. Department of Homeland Security following comments she made during a recent concert in Los Angeles. During the first of two performances at Brookside at the Rose Bowl in Pasadena, California, on Friday (Oct. 10), the 27-year-old pop star paused her hit-filled set to reflect on her appreciation for her adopted hometown. Related Chappell Roan Says Next Album ‘Doesn’t Exist Yet,’ Could Take ‘At Least 5’ Years to Finish Zach Bryan Condemns ICE & ‘Cocky Motherf–ker’ Cops in New Song Teaser Donald Trump Adviser Says ICE Agents Will Be at Bad Bunny’s ‘Shameful’ Super Bowl Halftime Show â€œL.A.â€™s my favorite city in the world, to be honest,â€ Roan told the crowd, according to Variety . â€œIâ€™ve been living here nine years. Iâ€™m originally from Missouri and I had a really, really tough time the first five years.” She went on to speak about the recent wildfires in the Los Angeles area and the communityâ€™s response. “Iâ€™m not gonna be eloquent about this,” she continued. “I loved L.A. more than ever than when I saw how the community came togetherâ€¦

items.title: The numbers behind O'Neill's Northern Ireland century
items.summary: Ahead of his 100th game in charge of Northern Ireland, BBC Sport NI looks at the numbers behind Michael O'Neill's century of matches as manager.

items.title: Healy's century helps Australia to record chase
items.summary: Alyssa Healy's brilliant 142 helps Australia complete a record women's one-day international chase as they beat India by three wickets in the 2025 World Cup.

items.title: Man Utd score four against Everton to maintain unbeaten start
items.summary: Substitute Jess Park scored a late double to help Manchester United secure a 4-1 win over Everton, carrying on their unbeaten start.

items.title: Park's explosive start at Man Utd as move pays off
items.summary: When Jess Park switched Manchester City for Manchester United some considered it a sideways step - but she is already showing why it was a good decision.

items.title: Stunning Walsh strike extends Chelsea's unbeaten league run
items.summary: Keira Walsh delivers an incredible strike to break Chelsea's deadlock against Tottenham to win 1-0 and maintain their unbeaten WSL run.

items.title: Three players, 57 goals - who is the best striker?
items.summary: BBC Sport looks at the goalscoring exploits of Harry Kane, Kylian Mbappe and Erling Haaland, who are all averaging more than a goal a game.

items.title: Mpome 'up and about' after being knocked out at Arsenal
items.summary: Brighton defender Maelys Mpome is "up and about" after being taken off the field on a stretcher, with her head in a brace and receiving oxygen during their WSL defeat at Arsenal.

items.title: Arsenal lacked quality and composure - Williams
items.summary: BBC Sport pundits Fara Williams and Anita Asante analyse Arsenal's attacking quality during their 1-0 Women's Super League win over Brighton.

items.title: Broncos survive scare to beat Jets in London
items.summary: The Denver Broncos produce an "almost impossible" defensive display to escape with a 13-11 victory against the winless New York Jets in London.

items.title: 'I felt the gods were against me' - Penge scrapes Spanish Open win in play-off
items.summary: Marco Penge wins a play-off against fellow Englishman Daniel Brown to take the Spanish Open title in Madrid.

items.title: Arsenal earn first win in five games against Brighton
items.summary: Arsenal end their four-match-long losing streak as they beat Brighton 1-0 in the Women's Super League at Emirates Stadium.

items.title: Charli XCX Makes Surprise Cameo in Role Modelâ€™s â€˜Sallyâ€™ Performance on â€˜Saturday Night Liveâ€™:Â Watch
items.summary: The singer-songwriter made his SNL debut alongside host Amy Poehler.
items.body: Role Model had a surprise in store for his Saturday Night Live musical guest debut. The 28-year-old singer-songwriter, born Tucker Pillsbury, appeared on the Oct. 11 episode of the long-running NBC sketch comedy show to perform two tracks from the deluxe edition of his second album, Kansas Anymore . Related Charli XCX Gets Intro From Julia Fox, Performs ‘360’ and ‘Sympathy Is a Knife’ on ‘SNL’: Watch Bad Bunny Fires Back at 2026 Super Bowl Halftime Show Backlash in ‘SNL’ Monologue: Watch Every Sketch From the 51st Season Premiere of ‘SNL’ Ranked After an introduction from host â€” and former SNL cast member â€” Amy Poehler , Role Model opened with his breakout hit, â€œSally, When the Wine Runs Out,â€ which recently reached No. 1 on Billboard â€™s Adult Alternative Airplay chart. Set against a moody barnyard backdrop, complete with haystacks and a wooden ladder, he took the stage in a brown shirt and sparkly blue jeans to deliver the upbeat track. In previous live performances, heâ€™s brought celebrities and fans alike â€” including Natalie Portman, Olivia Rodrigo and Troye Sivan â€” to step in as “Sally.” His SNL debut â€¦

items.title: 'One family that won' - Vacherot beats cousin for historic Shanghai title
items.summary: World number 204 Valentin Vacherot beats his cousin Arthur Rinderknech at the Shanghai Masters to become the lowest-ranked ATP Masters 1000 champion.

items.title: Murphy beats Wilson to set up meeting with Williams
items.summary: Shaun Murphy beats Gary Wilson 6-4 at the Xi'an Grand Prix - and will face a record-chasing Mark Williams in the final.

items.title: 'Fantastic' Healy hits 142 to help Australia complete record run chase
items.summary: Alyssa Healy's 142 runs off 107 balls helps Australia complete the highest successful run chase in women's ODI history to beat India at the ICC Women's Cricket World Cup.

items.title: Wales sense 'special moment' before Belgium showdown
items.summary: Wales boss Craig Bellamy wants his players to "embrace" the occasion of Monday's crucial World Cup qualifier against Belgium.

items.title: Wales sense 'special moment' before Belgium showdown
items.summary: Wales boss Craig Bellamy wants his players to "embrace" the occasion of Monday's crucial World Cup qualifier against Belgium.

items.title: Glasner in Palace deal talks but needs 'right conditions'
items.summary: Crystal Palace chairman Steve Parish says talks have taken place with Oliver Glasner about extending the contract of the Eagles manager as the two parties look to align their interests.

items.title: Super Sutherland takes five-wicket haul against India
items.summary: Annabel Sutherland's five wickets for 40 runs helps Australia bowl India out for 330 in their ICC Women's Cricket World Cup match.

items.title: Former Wales women head coach Abrahams dies aged 43

items.title: ALCS 2025: How to Watch Fox Online Without Cable to Stream Mariners vs. Blue Jays GamesÂ Live
items.summary: Say goodbye to expensive cable packages with our guide to livestream Fox and FS1 for MLB baseball at home.
items.body: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, Billboard may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. Fox and Fox Sports (FS1) have become a hub for some of the biggest sports, including Major League Baseball’s American League Championship Series (ALCS). The series features the Seattle Mariners taking on the Toronto Blue Jays in a best-of-7 series starting on Sunday, Oct. 12 with Game 1. The Blue Jays have home field advantage, so the series begins at Rogers Centre in Toronto, Canada, with first pitch at 8:03 p.m. ET/5:03 p.m. PT. Check out a complete ALCS schedule here . get directv free trial The easiest way for you to watch live games on Fox is through its cable channel, but that doesn’t mean there aren’t more affordable streaming options for those who have recently cut the cord. Opting for streaming packages may eliminate expensive cable bills, but it does come with some challenges like trying to livestream major games. Live TV streamers can eliminate the issue by giving access to Fox, FS1 and additional live sports channels. Kâ€¦

items.title: Diane Keaton, Oscar-Winning Star of â€˜Annie Hallâ€™ and â€˜The Godfather,â€™ Dies atÂ 79
items.summary: Keaton won the Oscar for best actress in 1978 for her work in 'Annie Hall.'
items.body: Diane Keaton , the Oscar-winning star of Annie Hall , The Godfather films and Father of the Bride , whose quirky, vibrant manner and depth made her one of the most singular actors of a generation, has died. She was 79. People first reported Saturday (Oct. 11) that she died in California with loved ones, citing a family spokesperson. No other details were immediately available, and representatives for Keaton did not immediately respond to inquiries. The unexpected news was met with shock around the world. Keaton was the kind of actor who helped make films iconic and timeless, from her â€œLa-dee-da, la-dee-daâ€ phrasing as Annie Hall, bedecked in that necktie, bowler hat, vest and khakis, to her heartbreaking turn as Kay Adams, the woman unfortunate enough to join the Corleone family. Her star-making performances in the 1970s, many of which were in Woody Allen films, were not a flash in the pan, and she would continue to charm new generations for decades thanks in part to a longstanding collaboration with filmmaker Nancy Meyers. Related Gone But Not Forgotten: Musicians We Lost in 2025 She played a businesswoman who unexpectedly inherits an infant in Baby Boom , the mother of the â€¦

items.title: Humble & sweet, but a lion - the story of the first female Â£1m player
items.summary: Meet the person behind women's football's first Â£1m player, Arsenal's new superstar forward Olivia Smith.

items.title: 'People looked at me like I was a something, not someone'
items.summary: In a candid interview, World Cup winner Heather Fisher discusses losing her hair and the struggle she had with her identity.

items.title: 'He fixes what needs fixing' - why Raducanu turned to Nadal's ex-coach
items.summary: Emma Raducanu recently appointed another full-time coach in Spaniard Francisco Roig - BBC Sport speaks to those who know him best.

items.title: 'He has made young players dream' - the making of Liverpool icon Salah
items.summary: BBC Sport visits Egypt to discover what Mohamed Salah means to the people of the football-mad country, and how a small boy from humble beginnings became a national icon.

items.title: Becky Zerlentes - the first female boxer to die in fight in US
items.summary: The story of Becky Zerlentes - the first female boxer to die in a sanctioned fight in the United States.
